title: um is this op
body:
i went full tank maokai top lane vs renek  i farmed up he was only able to kill me twice in lane and i died once in a teamfight i joined in the teamfights at around the 25 min mark i wind up with most damage done on the team and the only other champ that outdamaged me to enemy champions was their adc by only 200 points of damage

and for some reason my highest crit strike was 42 with no 1% crit rune
